DOC.brief_summary: This is a study of bimatoprost 0.01% (LUMIGAN® 0.01%) in subjects with primary open-angle glaucoma (POAG) or ocular hypertension (OH) who require further treatment for elevated intraocular pressure (IOP).
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Bimatoprost 0.01% in the Clinical Setting
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of primary openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension Determined by the treating physician to require treatment with bimatoprost 0.01%. Previous use of Lumigan® 0.01%
